title: Visiting Grandpa
creator_credit: Ethan Price, Ethan Hawkins, Riley Elson and Luke Breaden
brief_description: My name is Mick and I enjoy lots of exciting activities but not the activity of visiting Grandpa every Sunday. That is, until I find a photo album and discover I have more in common with Grandpa than I can imagine. Come and explore how two different people make a connection.
